sentences.en: And with the inchworm, he flew to where other birds needed to be measured.
sentences.cn: 知更鸟带著尺蠖飞到其他鸟需要被测量的地方。

sentences.en: Don't eat me. I am an inchworm. I am useful. I measure things.
sentences.cn: 不要吃我! 我是只尺蠖. 我很有用处. 我可以测量东西.

sentences.en: If you have ever experienced the childlike delight of discovering an inchworm, you know how fun they are to watch.
sentences.cn: 如果你有过看到尺蠖露出孩子般灿烂笑脸的经历，你就知道观察尺蠖是多么有趣。

sentences.en: The adorable inchworm is really the caterpillar of the geometer moth.
sentences.cn: 可爱的尺蠖就是尺蠖毛虫。

sentences.en: The flexure hinge mechanism is the key part of the inchworm type of X - Y - θ micro stage.
sentences.cn: 工作台的核心部件柔性铰链传动机构采用对称设计,有利于运动的 导向.
